data: On a cold, fretful afternoon in early October, 1872, a hansom cab drew up outside the offices of Lockhart and Selby, Shipping Agents, in the financial heart of London, and a young girl got out and paid the driver.
Lockhart and Selby, Shipping Agents | London
offices of Lockhart and Selby, Shipping Agents

The Ruby in the Smoke (Sally Lockhart, #1)
